titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to restore the preferential treatment for capital gains, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to repeal provisions which eliminated the 60 percent capital gains deduction for taxpayers other than corporations. Reduces the alternative tax rate for capital gains realized by a corporation from 34 percent to 14 percent.
